findings.details: Added visual separators and a subtle glass effect for share stats to improve readability on mobile and dark backgrounds.
Existing spacing and tap targets remain consistent after adjustments.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked in offline audit.
SEO tags, keywords, and Open Graph metadata remain present via layouts.
Copy remains clear and CTA-focused; updated styling supports quick scanning.

recommendations: Continue monitoring external links with a live checker in future runs.
Consider adding lightweight iconography for share stats if brand direction allows.
